description:
An insulated bottle to keep your water cold and let you drink it easily. It works equally well for keeping your hot beverages hot on cold autumn rides.

  • Polypropylene with HydroGuard™ lets you taste your water, not your bottle
  • Aerogel insulation keeps water colder for longer
  • Self-sealing Jet Valve™ eliminates splatters and spills
  • Easy-squeeze bottle lets you control the flow rate
  • Nozzle removes for cleaning
  • Wide-mouth opening is easy to clean or fill with ice
  • Lockout dial is leak proof
name: CamelBak Podium Ice 620ml Insulated Bottle
